article_title: ROSS DOUTHAT: The fate of Obamacare
article_text: For the first six years of the Obama era, many Republicans made an apocalyptic case against the president's health-care law. It was unconstitutional, immoral, borderline tyrannical. It wouldn't just fail: It would fail disastrously, in a death spiral that would take down most of U.S. health care as we know it.

article_metadata.title: ROSS DOUTHAT: The fate of Obamacare | SunHerald

article_summary:
For the first six years of the Obama era, many Republicans made an apocalyptic case against the president's health-care law.
It wouldn't just fail: It would fail disastrously, in a death spiral that would take down most of U.S. health care as we know it.
It was unconstitutional, immoral, borderline tyrannical.
